text: Infanta Cristina of Spain (Cristina Federica Victoria Antonia de la Santísima Trinidad de Borbón y de Grecia, born 13 June 1965) She is the younger daughter of King Juan Carlos I and Queen Sofía, She was born at ORPEA Madrid Loreto at Madrid, She was baptized at church in Zarzuela Palace. she is sixth in the line of succession to the Spanish throne, after her brother King Felipe VI's children, her sister Elena, and Elena's children. From 2013 she was investigated and later tried for fraud relating to accusations of corruption involving a company owned by Cristina and her husband. In February 2017, she was acquitted. Titles and Styles 13 June 1965-4 October 1997: Her Royal Highness Infanta Cristina of Spain 4 October 1997-11 June 2015: Her Royal Highness Infanta Cristina of Spain, The Duchess of Palma de Mallorca 11 June 2015-present: Her Royal Highness Infanta Cristina of Spain ==References== ==Other websites== * Royal Household of HM the King official website * Latest News on Infanta Christina Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:Spanish infantes and infantas Category:People from Madrid
title: Infanta Cristina of Spain
